-Captain America
@HatBat, do any of my 3 ships or uber missile get to be in the next episode with that rewrite? Please?

I'm still working on crafts (including a certain... unique one. You know what I mean, HatBat. ), but I'm willing to help with bits of the script for season 2 if need be, as writing is one of my strong suits.
We can help with writing? Writing doesn't require KSP. I can do that!
I would love to help write an episode of season two!

Yeah sure, I'd love to see what you guys can come up with. Write a story arc and PM it to me. I can't wait

Darn it I was going to make a post about this page gaining 300 comments with a 300 reference but you beat me too it

Edit: Never mind this post is the 300th comment

http://i.imgur.com/xGHx4av.jpg

lol, that's awesome xD

@HatBat, do any of my 3 ships or uber missile get to be in the next episode with that rewrite? Please?

Well, hopefully I'll be including a few ships in the next episode. I'm not too sure which ones though.

Edited September 14, 2014 by HatBat

Oh, by the way: What I was talking about when I said 'helping me with video', is that I need people to fly and record the GMI ships in order to make it a little more fair. To do this you'd obviously need a little bit of skill with filming but it shouldn't be to hard. I'd also appreciate people to help me set things up like Mission controller did, it was a massive help.

\\but it shouldn't be to hard.

Thats all depends on a persons ability with computers and is up to perspective. Remember how long it took me to learn how to make text files. Thank you for doing that BTW.

lol, that's awesome xD

Lol no prob. I have my moments

Yeah sure, I'd love to see what you guys can come up with. Write a story arc and PM it to me. I can't wait

I have a good idea... MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA
Definitely considering making this when .25 comes out.

SOOOOOOÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

Whatcha doin?
Testing some Kethane Ships for the new episode, talking business with EE, and deciding on a song for the end credits section that season 2 episodes are going to have. It's quite relaxing to be honest

talking business with EE

CAN'T DEAL WITH IT!!

Deciding on a song for the end credits section that season 2 episodes are going to have. It's quite relaxing to be honest

I recommend clicking random links that are music from a song which became popular from nowhere (Not VEVO, that always loops) I find a lot of good music that way.
I... I hate modern music.

Testing some Kethane Ships for the new episode, talking business with EE, and deciding on a song for the end credits section that season 2 episodes are going to have. It's quite relaxing to be honest

I got another song I could suggest.

It's called The Light Eternal

It's a song that tells the story of USAT Dorchester (a ship during WWII) that was sunk by a German U boat. As it was sinking 4 Army Chaplins helped crew members escape and passed out life vest. When the vest ran out, the four gave up their own life vest. Many witnesses recount that as the ship slipped below the waters the final site of the ship was the Four Chaplins arms linked singing Hymes.

Whether you're religious or not it was viewed as a act of bravery and sacrifice.

Wiki about the story

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four_Chaplains

I also want to state this is the last song I ever played in High School Band

Btw glad to hear you re doing much better

Edited September 16, 2014 by War Eagle 1

CAN'T DEAL WITH IT!!

I recommend clicking random links that are music from a song which became popular from nowhere (Not VEVO, that always loops) I find a lot of good music that way.

I... I hate modern music.

Why Megalodon!? WHY!!!???

I got another song I could suggest.

It's called The Light Eternal

It's a song that tells the story of USAT Dorchester (a ship during WWII) that was sunk by a German U boat. As it was sinking 4 Army Chaplins helped crew members escape and passed out life vest. When the vest ran out, the four gave up their own life vest. Many witnesses recount that as the ship slipped below the waters the final site of the ship was the Four Chaplins arms linked singing Hymes.

Whether you're religious or not it was viewed as a act of bravery and sacrifice.

http://youtu.be/MqpgJW3HE_0

Wiki about the story

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four_Chaplains

I also want to state this is the last song I ever played in High School Band

Btw glad to hear you re doing much better

No, I'm not religious; but I can certainly appreciate what those guys did. I'm not too sure about using the song though, it doesn't really fit with the feel of the Kethane Station. At the moment my two candidates are 'MBMR - Enemy Within' and 'M83 - Don't Save Us From The Flames'.

No, I'm not religious; but I can certainly appreciate what those guys did. I'm not too sure about using the song though, it doesn't really fit with the feel of the Kethane Station. At the moment my two candidates are 'MBMR - Enemy Within' and 'M83 - Don't Save Us From The Flames'.

Understand. And I hope you don't feel I'm pushing religion on you as well.

As for the song. I understand. Just a suggestion and trying to help. Being in band in High School, I can go back and find a full library of instrumental music.

I ll try to listen to those two songs later if you want a vote
